abstract: I.B.M. is releasing a test version of Project Bluehouse — an online collaboration suite that challenges products from Microsoft and Cisco.
snippet: I.B.M. is releasing a test version of Project Bluehouse — an online collaboration suite that challenges products from Microsoft and Cisco.
lead_paragraph: There’s an arms race of sorts taking place among some of the world’s largest technology companies as they scamper to control the next wave of office software.
